summary: New Moon replacers for 2012! Dont worry more are coming.
descriptionHtml:
2012 Moon Replacers 

Hello and welcome to my new installment of Moon replacers. 

First off I would like to advise you to use the No Secunda Mod of mine for these to show up properly with out you other moon and the rest of the sky having a black \'void\' in it.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5274

Second, as I make more of these, I will be putting them in packs for you all unless you prefer them as seperate downloads for easy use with Nexus Mod Manager.

Lasly these would always look even better when used with my Moon Size Tweek mod

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1037

Installing
========
Unpack into your data folder or use the green \'dowload with manager\' button


My Other Mods:
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5801\']1 Day Moon Phases[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=51\']20 Moons - Replacer Pack[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5358\']2012 Moon Replacers[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1037\']26 Moon Size Tweeks[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2438\']AVP[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=645\']Colored Logo[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2701\']Cybertron Moon[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5274\']No Secunda Moon[/url]
[url=\'http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=639\']Vibrant Dragons[/url]

Credits 
======
Google search and all respective original artists. Only credit I take is making them work in skyrim. I claim No ownership.

Much thanks to Igard @ Matrix games forums for his retextures of planets and such from www.celestiamotherlode.net
author: akindain
